Key Match Events: Rodrigo Bentancur scored the opening goal for Uruguay
Ismael Kone scored an acrobatic overhead kick to equalize for Canada
Jonathan David scored the go-ahead goal for Canada in the 80th minute
Luis Suarez scored a dramatic stoppage-time equalizer for Uruguay
Post-Match Reflections: Canada should hold their heads high as they finished the highest of all the guest nations invited to compete at the U.S. Copa America
Uruguay come third at 2024 Copa America
Miscellaneous Highlights: The tournament was criticized by Marcelo Bielsa and Jesse Marsch for being unprofessional and treating Uruguay like second-class citizens
Others: The match was played in Charlotte
